clinical_study.brief_title: Safety, Tolerability and Efficacy of Micardis® in Patients With Essential Hypertension
clinical_study.official_title: Safety, Tolerability and Efficacy of Micardis® (Telmisartan) in Patients With Essential Hypertension

brief_summary.textblock: This post-marketing surveillance study was designed to supplement under conditions of normal clinical practice the data on the safety, tolerability and efficacy of Micardis® collected during the clinical studies.

Up to 6 months after start of study

secondary_outcome.description: full response: reduction of diastolic blood pressure (DBP) by >= 10 mmHg or final DBP <= 90 mmHg overall response: reduction of DBP by >= 7mmHg or final DBP <= 90 mmHg
